name: The Little Streamer
body:
### Simple music streaming

Want to stream some music, but don't want to set up a database or deal with importing your music library to yet another application?

The Little Streaming is an _extremely_ no-frills music streaming. Point it at a directory of music and it will start up a [Sinatra](http://sinatrarb.com) app. Open your browser to [localhost:4567](http://localhost:4567) and stream away.

### Using The Little Streamer

The Little Streamer is available as a Ruby Gem:

```
gem install the_little_streamer
the_little_streamer /my/awesome/music/
```

### Options

Absolutely none.
tagline: A little Sinatra application to stream your music
